info.name: Frovo Catalogue API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Frovo Catalogue Management System

**Modules:**
- Category Management
- Sub-Category Management
- SKU Catalogue Management
- Dashboard & Reporting
- Image Upload
- Price Override Management

**Access Roles:**
- super_admin, admin, ops_manager: Full CRUD access
- Authentication required for all endpoints

item.name: Price Override

request.description:
Create a new price override for a SKU

**Required Role:** super_admin, admin, ops_manager

**Priority Levels:**
- Machine (5) - Most specific
- Location (4) - Campus/Tower/Floor
- Area (3)
- District (2)
- State (1) - Least specific

**Note:** Original catalogue price is NOT modified. Override is stored separately.

query.description: Filter by status: active, inactive, expired

request.description:
Get all price overrides with pagination and filtering

**Required Role:** super_admin, admin, ops_manager

Get a specific price override by ID

**Required Role:** super_admin, admin, ops_manager

Get all price overrides for a specific SKU

**Required Role:** super_admin, admin, ops_manager

Get the effective price for a SKU at a specific location/machine

**Returns:**
- base_price: Original catalogue price
- effective_price: Price after override (if any)
- is_overridden: Whether an override is applied
- override_details: Override info if applicable

**Priority:** Machine > Location > Area > District > State

Update a price override

**Required Role:** super_admin, admin, ops_manager

**Updateable fields:**
- override_price
- start_date
- end_date
- reason
- status
- state, district, area_id, location, machine_id

Delete a price override

**Required Role:** super_admin, admin, ops_manager

**Note:** This permanently removes the override. History is preserved.

query.description: Filter by action: CREATE, UPDATE, DELETE, ACTIVATE, DEACTIVATE, EXPIRE
Filter by user who performed action

request.description:
Get audit history of all price override changes

**Required Role:** super_admin, admin, ops_manager

**Tracks:**
- Who made the change
- What was changed (before/after values)
- When it was changed
- IP address and user agent

Get audit history for a specific price override

**Required Role:** super_admin, admin, ops_manager

Manually trigger expiry check for overrides past their end date

**Required Role:** super_admin only

**Note:** This is typically run by a cron job, but can be triggered manually.

item.description:
Price Override Management APIs

**Features:**
- Override prices at State/District/Area/Location/Machine level
- Time-bound overrides with start and end dates
- Priority system (most specific wins)
- Full audit history
- Original catalogue price is never modified

**Access Roles:** super_admin, admin, ops_manager
